content: Very good potential - I like the Victorian London horror concept; however, if you are charging for it at least make more than 3 stages! Not sure why there are additional ads either if this is considered a premium app - they should be optional if the player wants additional bonuses. Also, after using an ad for resurrection, the character can't move for a few seconds, causing damage or even death without being able to do anything. Item drop is fairly low as well, but not as low as other games.
replyContent: Thank you so much - we're happy you loved the Victorian style of the game! We've already added a new chapter - check it out ;) In Pro you get a pack of useful items, but the gameplay is the same. Please tell us on help@pgstudio.io what features you want to see to rate the game by 5 stars :)
